qas.question: What is the most popular sport in Portugal?
What is still a major symbol of Portuguese football history?
Who are two examples of the top football players born in Portugal?
What award did both Luís Figo and Cristiano Ronaldo win?

answers.text: FIFA World Player of the Year

qas.question: Who are some of the most renowned football managers in Portugal?

answers.text: José Mourinho, André Villas-Boas, Fernando Santos, Carlos Queiroz and Manuel José

context: <a0_0>Football<a0_0/> is the most popular sport in Portugal. There are several football competitions ranging from local amateur to world-class professional level. The legendary <a1_0>Eusébio<a1_0/> is still a major symbol of Portuguese football history. <a3_0>FIFA World Player of the Year<a3_0/> winners <a2_0>Luís Figo and Cristiano Ronaldo<a2_0/> who won the FIFA Ballon d'Or for 2013 and 2014, are among the numerous examples of other world-class football players born in Portugal and noted worldwide. Portuguese football managers are also noteworthy, with <a4_0>José Mourinho, André Villas-Boas, Fernando Santos, Carlos Queiroz and Manuel José<a4_0/> among the most renowned.
